vc-pref-mypref3-help: Choose a style for the Voice Commander UI!
vc-pref-mypref1-help: Check if you wish to have the Voice Commander listen always. You can give commands by saying its name first.
vc-special-intro: Welcome to Voice Commander. On this page you can see whether or not your current browser supports this extension. Additionnally, if logged in, you can see your current customization settings.
vc-special-check-compatibility:
Checking your browser - please have Javascript active.

Congrats! Your browser supports Voice Commander!

Unfortunately, your browser does not support Voice Commander.
vc-special-user-change-name-1: The name of your Voice Commander is
vc-special-user-change-name-2: Change it simply by telling her:
vc-special-user-change-name-3: , from here on out I'm going to call you <Name>!
